Articles.Content:
Apparently, Jeb Bush's campaign is pushing this Twitter hashtag for his election run.

When I saw #JebCanFixIt, I most definitely IMMEDIATELY thought of our hero Jebediah Kerman :-)
But he can't because he's not an engineer...
We should totally hijack it for KSP.
I wonder what Jeb Bush's Courage and Stupidity stats are.

We should totally hijack it for KSP.

Easy mode: Just grab one of the "JEB!" images and put our little green hero's face in place of the politician's.

Normal mode: Find a #JebCanFixIt poster, replace imagery with our own Jeb grinning in front of an explosion (like on the steam card).

I wonder what Jeb Bush's Courage and Stupidity stats are.

I laughed hard!

I wonder what Jeb Bush's Courage and Stupidity stats are.

[Numbers with political bias]
I wonder how long this post will survive before it gets closed
Post the h#%$ out of it while er can!

I wonder how long this post will survive before it gets closed

Well if we can keep actual politics out of it and leave it as just a thread on how we can use a politician's hashtag for our own purposes, I don't see why they would.
Who cares about twitter anyway?

The last thread I posted about jeb bush got close in about 2 hours so post your thoughts. What I think is I'd give bill gates full money to his campaign(if I had that money) if he makes a poster like that and posts a video of him playing Ksp on YouTube.

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B2ba6grAqfXRUHVFSFBQQzhBSzA

Edited November 2, 2015 by 322997am

The last thread I posted about jeb bush got close in about 2 hours so post your thoughts. What I think is I'd give bill gates full money to his campaign(if I had that money) if he makes a poster like that and posts a video of him playing Ksp on YouTube.

Yeah I always rate candidates on what video games they play.

Yeah I always rate candidates on what video games they play.
#legit. Also whether I want to hang out with them.

Instead of debates, just put all the candidates down infront of a KSP session, and whoever gets to the Mun with the least expensive rocket wins.

Creative thinking, problem solving and keeping a budget!

Only the one who gets he most explosions and the one with the most boosters and the one who gets there at the least for wins. Not the cheapest.

would be far better

Anyhow: Jeb (the kerbal) never fixes it!

Scott manley?

Anyhow: Jeb (the kerbal) never fixes it!

Don't think he counts as he's pretty much famous BECAUSE he plays KSP.
Well, seeing as this thread is only really connected to KSP in the most tenuous of ways (seriously, it's three letters) I'm moving it to the Space Lounge.

Well if we can keep actual politics out of it and leave it as just a thread on how we can use a politician's hashtag for our own purposes, I don't see why they would.
I wonder what Jeb Bush's Courage and Stupidity stats are.

Well.. he's a politician running for President. That takes a pretty high courage Stat I'd think. The stupidity Stat is a given.. he's a politician.

The real question is.. does he have a badS modifier?
